tasks.title: Define recipe TypeScript types from schema
tasks.description: Create TypeScript interfaces/types for the full recipe schema: Recipe, RecipeSource, RecipeTags, Servings, and related types.

tasks.title: Implement ULID generation for recipe IDs
tasks.description: Add ULID dependency and create a utility for generating recipe IDs.

tasks.title: Build YAML frontmatter parser
tasks.description: Parse Markdown files with YAML frontmatter into structured Recipe objects. Handle the frontmatter/body split.

tasks.title: Build YAML frontmatter serializer
tasks.description: Serialize a Recipe object back into a Markdown file with YAML frontmatter.

tasks.title: Implement frontmatter validation
tasks.description: Validate all frontmatter fields per spec: ULID format, title length, slug format, servings positivity, ISO 8601 durations, difficulty enum, source.type enum, tag format regex.

tasks.title: Implement Markdown body validation
tasks.description: Validate that the body contains required ## Ingredients and ## Instructions sections with at least one list item each, and that total body size is under 50,000 characters.

tasks.title: Implement slug generation with collision avoidance
tasks.description: Generate URL-safe slugs from recipe titles. Handle collisions by appending -2, -3, etc. Regenerate slug on title change.

tasks.title: Implement on-save logic (updatedAt, totalTime calc)
tasks.description: On save: set updatedAt to current time, recalculate totalTime from prepTime + cookTime if both present and totalTime not explicitly set.

tasks.title: Define tag taxonomy constants and validation
tasks.description: Create constants for built-in tag groups (cuisine, meal, diet, technique, custom) and validate tag values against the regex /^[a-z0-9-]{1,50}$/ with max 20 tags per group.

tasks.title: Write unit tests for recipe data model
tasks.description: Test parsing, serialization, validation (valid and invalid cases), slug generation, on-save logic, and tag validation.

tasks.title: Set up SQLite database connection
tasks.description: Initialize SQLite database using Deno's SQLite module. Create the database file and connection utility with proper error handling.

tasks.title: Create migration runner
tasks.description: Build a lightweight migration runner that tracks applied migrations in a _migrations table, applies unapplied migrations in order on startup, and runs each migration in a transaction.

tasks.title: Write initial schema migrations
tasks.description: Create the sequential migration SQL files: 001_create_recipes.sql (recipes table with all columns and constraints), 002_create_recipe_tags.sql (normalized tags table), 003_create_fts.sql (FTS5 virtual table).

tasks.title: Create index migrations
tasks.description: Write migration for standard indexes: slug uniqueness, created_at, updated_at, difficulty, and tag query indexes (group+value composite, value-only).

tasks.title: Implement recipe write path (insert/update)
tasks.description: Build the transactional write path: insert/update recipes row, delete and re-insert recipe_tags, and update the FTS index — all within a single transaction.

tasks.title: Implement recipe read queries
tasks.description: Build query functions for: get recipe by slug, get recipe by ID, list recipes with pagination and sorting (by created_at, updated_at).

tasks.title: Implement tag-based query functions
tasks.description: Build AND, OR, and NOT tag query functions using INTERSECT/UNION/NOT IN patterns against the recipe_tags table.

tasks.title: Implement full-text search query
tasks.description: Build a search function using the FTS5 virtual table to search recipe titles and body content, returning results ranked by relevance.

tasks.title: Implement re-index operation
tasks.description: Build a re-index command that reads the document column for all recipes, re-parses frontmatter/body, and rebuilds extracted columns, recipe_tags, and FTS index.

tasks.title: Write unit tests for database layer
tasks.description: Test migration runner, recipe CRUD operations, tag queries (AND/OR/NOT), full-text search, constraint enforcement, and transactional integrity.

tasks.title: Create response envelope helpers
tasks.description: Build utility functions for the standard JSON response envelope: success (single + list), error, and pagination meta. Include requestId generation.

tasks.title: Implement request validation middleware
tasks.description: Build a reusable validation layer for incoming request bodies and query parameters. Return 400 with structured error details on failure. Strip unknown fields.

tasks.title: Implement GET /api/v1/recipes (list)
tasks.description: Create the recipe list endpoint with pagination (page, pageSize), sorting (createdAt, updatedAt, title), and optional difficulty filter. Return summary objects without document body.

tasks.title: Implement GET /api/v1/recipes/:slug (detail)
tasks.description: Create the recipe detail endpoint that returns the full recipe object including parsed Markdown body. Return 404 if slug not found.

tasks.title: Implement POST /api/v1/recipes (create)
tasks.description: Create the recipe creation endpoint. Validate request body, auto-generate id/slug/createdAt/updatedAt/totalTime, persist via the database write path, and return 201 with the full recipe.

tasks.title: Implement PUT /api/v1/recipes/:slug (full update)
tasks.description: Create the full recipe replacement endpoint. Require all writable fields, preserve id and createdAt, set updatedAt, regenerate slug if title changed. Return 200 with updated recipe.

tasks.title: Implement PATCH /api/v1/recipes/:slug (partial update)
tasks.description: Create the partial update endpoint with merge semantics: top-level fields replaced, tag groups replaced per-group, body replaces entirely if provided. Return 200 with full updated recipe.

tasks.title: Implement DELETE /api/v1/recipes/:slug
tasks.description: Create the recipe deletion endpoint. Remove the recipe and return 204 No Content. Return 404 if slug not found.

tasks.title: Implement GET /api/v1/recipes/search (full-text search)
tasks.description: Create the full-text search endpoint using FTS5. Accept q parameter, return paginated recipe summaries ordered by relevance. Return 400 if q is missing.

tasks.title: Implement GET /api/v1/recipes/query (tag query)
tasks.description: Create the tag-based query endpoint supporting include (AND), any (OR), and exclude (NOT) parameters as comma-separated group:value pairs. Return paginated results with sorting.

tasks.title: Implement GET /api/v1/tags endpoints
tasks.description: Create endpoints to list all tags grouped with usage counts (GET /api/v1/tags) and list tags within a specific group (GET /api/v1/tags/:group).

tasks.title: Set up SvelteKit API route file structure
tasks.description: Create the SvelteKit file-based route structure under src/routes/api/v1/ with +server.ts files for recipes, recipes/[slug], recipes/search, recipes/query, tags, and tags/[group].

tasks.title: Write integration tests for API routes
tasks.description: Test all API endpoints: CRUD operations, pagination, sorting, search, tag queries, validation error responses, 404 handling, and response envelope format.

tasks.title: Write users and sessions migration files
tasks.description: Create 004_create_users.sql and 005_create_sessions.sql migration files with the users table, sessions table, and their indexes.

tasks.title: Define User and Session TypeScript types
tasks.description: Create TypeScript interfaces for User (id, email, displayName, createdAt, updatedAt) and Session (id, userId, createdAt, expiresAt). Exclude passwordHash from the public User type.

tasks.title: Implement password hashing utility
tasks.description: Create a utility module for bcrypt password hashing (cost factor 10) and comparison. Enforce password length rules (8–128 characters).

tasks.title: Implement session token generation and management
tasks.description: Create functions for generating cryptographically random 32-byte hex session tokens, creating session rows, validating sessions, extending expiry (sliding window at 50% lifetime), and deleting sessions.

tasks.title: Implement SvelteKit handle hook for session validation
tasks.description: Add session validation in src/hooks.server.ts: read the session cookie, look up the token, load the user into event.locals.user. Update app.d.ts with the Locals type.

tasks.title: Implement POST /api/v1/auth/register
tasks.description: Create the registration endpoint: validate email/displayName/password, hash password, insert user, return 201 with user data. Handle 409 for duplicate emails.

tasks.title: Implement POST /api/v1/auth/login
tasks.description: Create the login endpoint: validate credentials, compare password hash, create session row, set session cookie, return user data. Return generic 401 on failure.

tasks.title: Implement POST /api/v1/auth/logout
tasks.description: Create the logout endpoint: delete the session row, clear the session cookie, return 204. Idempotent if no session exists.

tasks.title: Implement GET /api/v1/auth/me
tasks.description: Create the current-user endpoint: return the authenticated user's data from event.locals.user. Return 401 if not authenticated.

tasks.title: Implement requireAuth helper and protect write endpoints
tasks.description: Create a reusable requireAuth function that throws 401 if event.locals.user is missing. Add it to POST/PUT/PATCH/DELETE recipe endpoints.

tasks.title: Implement expired session cleanup
tasks.description: Build a function to delete expired sessions from the sessions table. Can be called on a schedule or on-demand.

tasks.title: Write tests for auth system
tasks.description: Test registration (valid, duplicate email, invalid input), login (valid, wrong password, wrong email), logout, session validation, session expiry, requireAuth middleware, and cookie handling.

tasks.title: Implement tag query parser
tasks.description: Build the parser that accepts comma-separated group:value strings from API query parameters, validates group and value, deduplicates, and detects contradictory queries (tag in both include and exclude).

tasks.title: Implement tag query SQL builder
tasks.description: Build the SQL generator that translates a parsed TagQuery (AND/OR/NOT operators) into parameterized SQL using INTERSECT, UNION, and NOT IN subqueries against the recipe_tags table.

tasks.title: Implement full-text search query processing
tasks.description: Build the search query processor: sanitize user input (strip FTS5 operators), tokenize, append prefix wildcard to last term, and execute against recipes_fts with BM25 ranking (title weight 10.0, body weight 1.0).

tasks.title: Implement sort parser and SQL generation
tasks.description: Build the sort option parser that accepts a sort string (e.g., '-createdAt'), validates against allowed fields (createdAt, updatedAt, title), and generates ORDER BY clauses with a secondary sort on id for stability.

tasks.title: Implement pagination logic
tasks.description: Build the pagination module: validate page/pageSize parameters, calculate offset, execute COUNT query for total items, and assemble pagination meta (page, pageSize, totalItems, totalPages).

tasks.title: Build composable query builder
tasks.description: Create the QueryBuilder that composes tag filters, full-text search, difficulty filter, sorting, and pagination into a single parameterized SQL query. Ensure all user input is passed as bind parameters.

tasks.title: Implement query input validation and error handling
tasks.description: Add validation for all query inputs: max tags per operator (10), max search query length (200 chars), invalid sort fields, out-of-range pagination. Return structured errors per the error handling table in the spec.

tasks.title: Write unit tests for search and query engine
tasks.description: Test tag query parsing (valid, invalid, contradictory), SQL generation for all operator combinations, FTS query sanitization and prefix matching, sort parsing, pagination calculation, and query builder composition.

tasks.title: Set up Deno project with deno.json config
tasks.description: Create deno.json with compiler options, task definitions (dev, build, preview, check, test, lint, fmt), import map aliases ($lib), and nodeModulesDir setting.

tasks.title: Create SvelteKit project structure
tasks.description: Set up svelte.config.js, vite.config.ts, app.html, and the directory skeleton: src/lib/server/db, src/lib/server/auth, src/lib/server/middleware, src/lib/server/services, src/lib/models, src/lib/utils, src/routes/api/v1.

tasks.title: Implement app.d.ts with Locals type declarations
tasks.description: Define the App.Locals interface with requestId and optional user fields, establishing the typed contract for SvelteKit's event.locals.

tasks.title: Implement request ID middleware hook
tasks.description: Create the requestId handle hook in hooks.server.ts that generates a ULID per request, attaches it to event.locals.requestId, and sets the X-Request-Id response header.

tasks.title: Implement AppError class hierarchy
tasks.description: Create src/lib/models/errors.ts with AppError base class and subclasses: NotFoundError, ValidationError, ConflictError, AuthError. Each carries a code, message, HTTP status, and optional details.

tasks.title: Implement withErrorHandling route wrapper
tasks.description: Create the withErrorHandling utility in src/lib/server/middleware/error-handler.ts that catches AppError instances in route handlers and converts them to JSON error responses with the correct status code.

tasks.title: Implement response envelope helpers
tasks.description: Create src/lib/utils/response.ts with success(), listSuccess(), and errorResponse() functions that produce the standard JSON response envelope with requestId and pagination meta.

tasks.title: Implement environment config loader
tasks.description: Create src/lib/server/config.ts that reads environment variables (DATABASE_PATH, SESSION_COOKIE, SESSION_MAX_AGE, BCRYPT_COST, NODE_ENV) with typed defaults and throws on missing required values.

tasks.title: Implement handleError hook for unexpected errors
tasks.description: Add the handleError export to hooks.server.ts that logs the full error server-side with the requestId and returns a sanitized error response to the client.

tasks.title: Set up test directory structure and conventions
tasks.description: Create tests/unit and tests/integration directories. Add a sample test file verifying the Deno test runner works with @std/assert. Document test naming conventions.

tasks.title: Implement URL validator for import pipeline
tasks.description: Build the URL validation module: check for valid absolute URL with http/https scheme, block private/internal IP ranges (SSRF prevention), enforce 2048 char max length, and support a configurable domain blocklist.

tasks.title: Implement HTTP fetcher for import pipeline
tasks.description: Build the fetcher module that issues an HTTP GET with a custom User-Agent, 15-second timeout, 5 MB max response size, and max 5 redirects. Return the HTML body or a typed fetch error.

tasks.title: Implement JSON-LD recipe extractor
tasks.description: Parse <script type="application/ld+json"> blocks from HTML, locate Schema.org Recipe objects (including @graph arrays), and extract all mapped fields (name, recipeIngredient, recipeInstructions, times, yield, author, image, etc.).

tasks.title: Implement microdata recipe extractor
tasks.description: Walk the DOM for elements with itemscope/itemtype containing schema.org/Recipe, collect itemprop values, and map to the same field mapping as JSON-LD extraction.

tasks.title: Implement fallback HTML scraper
tasks.description: Build heuristic-based extraction: find title from h1/og:title/title, ingredients from ul/ol in ingredient-like containers, instructions from ol in instruction/direction/step/method containers, and image from og:image or largest img.

tasks.title: Implement extraction strategy dispatcher
tasks.description: Build the extractor module that tries JSON-LD, microdata, and fallback scraping in priority order, short-circuiting on the first success. Return extracted data with the strategy used and per-field confidence levels.

tasks.title: Implement duration and yield parsers
tasks.description: Build duration-parser.ts (human-readable strings like '30 minutes' → ISO 8601 PT30M, plain numbers assumed minutes) and yield-parser.ts (strings like '4 servings', '6', '4-6' → { default: number, unit: string }).

tasks.title: Implement tag inferrer for imported recipes
tasks.description: Build tag-inferrer.ts: map recipeCuisine → tags.cuisine, recipeCategory → tags.meal, scan keywords/title for dietary terms → tags.diet, remaining keywords → tags.custom. Lowercase, hyphenate, validate against tag regex.

tasks.title: Implement recipe normalizer
tasks.description: Build normalizer.ts that transforms raw extracted data into an ImportDraft: generate ULID/slug/timestamps, set source metadata, assemble Markdown body (## Ingredients, ## Instructions, ## Notes), infer tags, run validation, and collect warnings.

tasks.title: Implement import service orchestrator
tasks.description: Build import-service.ts that orchestrates the full pipeline: validate URL → fetch HTML → extract recipe → normalize to draft. Handle errors at each stage and return the ImportDraft or a typed error.

tasks.title: Implement POST /api/v1/recipes/import endpoint
tasks.description: Create the SvelteKit route at src/routes/api/v1/recipes/import/+server.ts. Require auth, accept { url } body, call import service, return the ImportDraft as a 200 response or error.

tasks.title: Write tests for recipe import pipeline
tasks.description: Test URL validation (valid, private IP, too long), JSON-LD extraction (single Recipe, @graph, missing fields), microdata extraction, fallback scraping, duration/yield parsing, tag inference, normalization, and end-to-end import service.

tasks.title: Implement image validator for OCR pipeline
tasks.description: Build the image validation module: check magic bytes for JPEG/PNG/WebP/HEIC, enforce 10 MB max file size, validate dimensions (min 200x200, max 8000x8000).

tasks.title: Implement image preprocessor
tasks.description: Build the image preprocessing module using sharp: auto-orient from EXIF, convert to grayscale, resize if longest edge exceeds 4000px, normalize HEIC to PNG.

tasks.title: Implement Tesseract.js OCR engine wrapper
tasks.description: Create the OCR engine module: initialize Tesseract.js worker with LSTM mode, configure language support, process images with 60-second timeout, return full text and confidence score.

tasks.title: Implement OCR text cleaner
tasks.description: Build the text cleanup module: normalize whitespace, apply common OCR substitution corrections (l→1, O→0, rn→m, etc.) in recipe context, remove page artifacts like headers/footers and page numbers.

tasks.title: Implement recipe text parser
tasks.description: Build the recipe parser that identifies title, ingredients, instructions, servings, and time values from cleaned OCR text using heuristic section detection. Assign confidence levels to each section.

tasks.title: Implement OCR draft normalizer
tasks.description: Build the normalizer that transforms parsed OCR output into a draft Recipe object: generate ULID/slug/timestamps, set source.type to 'ocr', build Markdown body, infer tags from title/ingredients, run validation, collect warnings.

tasks.title: Define OCR TypeScript types
tasks.description: Create TypeScript interfaces for OcrDraft, OcrWarning, OcrParseResult, and RightsAttestation in src/lib/models/ocr-types.ts.

tasks.title: Implement rights attestation validation
tasks.description: Add attestation enforcement to POST /api/v1/recipes: when source.type is 'ocr', require the attestation field with a valid attestationType. Return 400 OCR_ATTESTATION_REQUIRED if missing.

tasks.title: Implement OCR service orchestrator
tasks.description: Build ocr-service.ts that orchestrates the full pipeline: validate image → preprocess → OCR → clean text → parse → normalize to draft. Handle errors at each stage and return OcrDraft or typed error.

tasks.title: Implement POST /api/v1/recipes/ocr endpoint
tasks.description: Create the SvelteKit route at src/routes/api/v1/recipes/ocr/+server.ts. Require auth, accept multipart/form-data with image and optional language, call OCR service, return OcrDraft as 200 response or error.

tasks.title: Write tests for OCR pipeline
tasks.description: Test image validation (valid formats, oversized, too small, corrupt), image preprocessing, OCR engine wrapper (mock Tesseract), text cleaner substitutions, recipe parser section detection, normalizer, attestation enforcement, and end-to-end OCR service.

tasks.title: Implement ingredient line parser
tasks.description: Build the parser that transforms raw ingredient lines from Markdown into ParsedIngredient objects: extract quantity (integers, decimals, fractions, mixed numbers, ranges), unit, name, prep notes, and parenthetical notes.

tasks.title: Define shopping list TypeScript types
tasks.description: Create TypeScript interfaces for ParsedIngredient, ShoppingListRequest, ShoppingList, ShoppingListItem, ShoppingListRecipeRef, and ScalingRequest in src/lib/models/shopping-list.ts.

tasks.title: Build unit dictionary and normalizer
tasks.description: Create the unit dictionary mapping aliases to canonical unit names (tsp, tbsp, cup, oz, lb, g, kg, ml, l, etc.) with case-insensitive matching. Classify each unit by type (volume, weight, count).

tasks.title: Implement unit conversion logic
tasks.description: Build within-type unit conversion functions for volume (tsp→tbsp→cup, ml→l) and weight (oz→lb, g→kg). Apply threshold-based upsizing (e.g., 3 tsp → 1 tbsp, 16 oz → 1 lb).

tasks.title: Implement recipe scaling math
tasks.description: Build the scaling module that adjusts ingredient quantities based on target vs. default servings. Handle null quantities, enforce 0.25×–10× scaling limits, and round to friendly fractions.

tasks.title: Implement friendly fraction formatter
tasks.description: Build a utility that converts decimal quantities to display strings using common fractions (¼, ⅓, ½, ⅔, ¾) and mixed numbers (1 ½, 2 ¼). Fall back to 2 decimal places for non-standard values.

tasks.title: Implement ingredient name normalizer for deduplication
tasks.description: Build name normalization: lowercase, trim whitespace, strip articles (a/an/the), basic singularization (suffix-based), and remove common modifiers (fresh, dried, frozen, organic, large, small, etc.).

tasks.title: Implement multi-recipe aggregation and deduplication
tasks.description: Build the aggregation pipeline: group parsed ingredients by normalized name, merge quantities with compatible units, keep incompatible units as separate line items, and handle null-quantity merging rules.

tasks.title: Implement shopping list service orchestrator
tasks.description: Build shopping-list-service.ts that orchestrates the full pipeline: resolve recipes → parse ingredients → scale → normalize names → aggregate → format output. Handle errors at each stage.

tasks.title: Implement POST /api/v1/shopping-list endpoint
tasks.description: Create the SvelteKit route at src/routes/api/v1/shopping-list/+server.ts. Require auth, validate request body (items array, servings, limits), call shopping list service, return ShoppingList response.

tasks.title: Write tests for shopping list engine
tasks.description: Test ingredient parsing (all quantity formats, edge cases, unparseable lines), unit normalization, unit conversion, scaling math, fraction formatting, name normalization, dedup/aggregation rules, and end-to-end shopping list service.

tasks.title: Write user_preferences and recipe_interactions migrations
tasks.description: Create migration files for the user_preferences table (user_id, pref_type, tag_group, tag_value) and recipe_interactions table (id, user_id, recipe_id, action, created_at) with indexes.

tasks.title: Define recommendation TypeScript types
tasks.description: Create TypeScript interfaces for TagFrequencyProfile, TagCount, UserPreferences, RecommendationQuery, ScoredRecipe, and score breakdown in src/lib/models/recommendation.ts.

tasks.title: Implement tag frequency profile builder
tasks.description: Build the module that queries recipe_tags for a user's collection and returns a TagFrequencyProfile with per-tag counts and frequencies.

tasks.title: Implement user preferences CRUD
tasks.description: Build functions to read, upsert, and delete user preferences (boosts and suppressions) in the user_preferences table. Enforce max 20 total and no contradictions.

tasks.title: Implement tag similarity scorer
tasks.description: Build the tag similarity scoring function that compares a candidate recipe's tags against the user's tag frequency profile and returns a 0–1 score.

tasks.title: Implement preference boost scorer
tasks.description: Build the preference boost/suppression scoring function: +0.15 per boosted tag (capped at +1.0), -0.5 per suppressed tag (floored at -1.0).

tasks.title: Implement freshness bonus and composite score calculator
tasks.description: Build the freshness bonus function (0.1 decaying over 30 days) and the composite score calculator that combines tag similarity (0.6), preference boost (0.25), freshness (0.1), and diversity penalty (0.05).

tasks.title: Implement diversity re-ranking
tasks.description: Build the greedy diversity re-ranker that penalizes candidates sharing too many tags with already-selected recommendations, applied over a 3x candidate pool.

tasks.title: Implement cold-start fallback strategies
tasks.description: Build cold-start handling: return popular recipes (by view count) for new users, apply confidence discount for sparse collections (< 10 recipes), and supplement with popular recipes to fill the set.

tasks.title: Implement reason generation
tasks.description: Build the reason generator that produces human-readable explanation strings from the scoring breakdown using the defined templates.

tasks.title: Implement recommendation service orchestrator
tasks.description: Build recommendation-service.ts that orchestrates the full pipeline: build profile → apply query filters → score candidates → diversify → generate reasons → return ranked results.

tasks.title: Implement GET /api/v1/recommendations endpoint
tasks.description: Create the SvelteKit route for personalized recommendations. Require auth, parse query params (limit, difficulty, maxTime, excludeOwned, tags, mood), call recommendation service, return scored results.

tasks.title: Implement GET /api/v1/recommendations/profile endpoint
tasks.description: Create the endpoint that returns the user's computed tag frequency profile and current preferences.

tasks.title: Implement PUT /api/v1/recommendations/preferences endpoint
tasks.description: Create the endpoint to update user taste preferences (boosts and suppressions). Validate constraints and return updated preferences.

tasks.title: Implement POST /api/v1/recipes/:slug/interact endpoint
tasks.description: Create the endpoint to record user interactions (view, save) with recipes. Require auth, validate action, store in recipe_interactions, return 204.

tasks.title: Write tests for recommendation engine
tasks.description: Test tag frequency profile building, preference CRUD and validation, tag similarity scoring, preference boost scoring, composite score calculation, diversity re-ranking, cold-start fallbacks, reason generation, and end-to-end recommendation service.

tasks.title: Set up Tailwind CSS 4 with app.css theme config
tasks.description: Create src/app.css with Tailwind 4 @import and @theme block defining color palette, typography, border radius, and shadows. Configure dark mode overrides via @theme dark.

tasks.title: Initialize shadcn-svelte and install base components
tasks.description: Run shadcn-svelte init, then add initial component set: Button, Card, Input, Label, Textarea, Select, Dialog, Badge, Separator, Skeleton, Toast, DropdownMenu.

tasks.title: Create root layout with Navbar and Footer
tasks.description: Build +layout.svelte with Navbar, main content area, and Footer. Create +layout.server.ts that passes auth state (locals.user) to the layout.

tasks.title: Build Navbar component
tasks.description: Create Navbar.svelte with app title/logo, navigation links (Recipes, Search, Shopping List, Recommendations), and user menu (login/register or user dropdown with logout).

tasks.title: Implement dark mode toggle and theme utility
tasks.description: Create $lib/utils/theme.ts with getTheme/setTheme functions (localStorage + prefers-color-scheme fallback). Add dark mode toggle to Navbar.

tasks.title: Create API client base and domain modules
tasks.description: Build $lib/api/client.ts with typed fetch wrapper (get, post, put, patch, delete) and error handling. Create $lib/api/recipes.ts and $lib/api/auth.ts domain modules.

tasks.title: Create auth runes store
tasks.description: Build $lib/stores/auth.svelte.ts with runes-based current user state (setUser, getUser). Wire it to the root layout's auth data.

tasks.title: Create global error page
tasks.description: Build src/routes/+error.svelte displaying the error status code, message, and a link to go home. Style with Tailwind.

tasks.title: Create shared UI components (LoadingSpinner, EmptyState, ErrorBanner, Pagination)
tasks.description: Build reusable shared components in $lib/components/shared/: LoadingSpinner, EmptyState (icon + message + optional action), ErrorBanner (dismissible error), Pagination (page controls).

tasks.title: Set up frontend route skeleton with placeholder pages
tasks.description: Create the route directory structure for all pages (recipes, recipes/new, recipes/import, recipes/ocr, recipes/[slug], recipes/[slug]/edit, search, shopping-list, recommendations, auth/login, auth/register) with minimal placeholder +page.svelte files.

tasks.title: Implement auth guard pattern for protected routes
tasks.description: Add +page.server.ts load functions to protected routes (recipes/new, recipes/import, recipes/ocr, recipes/[slug]/edit, shopping-list, recommendations) that redirect to /auth/login if locals.user is not set.

tasks.title: Write tests for frontend architecture utilities
tasks.description: Test API client (success and error responses), theme utility (getTheme/setTheme), and auth store (setUser/getUser).

tasks.title: Add semantic color tokens to app.css
tasks.description: Add success, warning, and info color tokens to the @theme block in src/app.css alongside the existing palette.

tasks.title: Install additional shadcn-svelte components
tasks.description: Install Checkbox, Switch, Tabs, and Tooltip shadcn-svelte components via CLI into $lib/components/ui/.

tasks.title: Install and configure lucide-svelte icon library
tasks.description: Add lucide-svelte dependency and verify tree-shaking works for individual icon imports.

tasks.title: Build RecipeCard component
tasks.description: Create RecipeCard.svelte displaying image thumbnail, title, difficulty badge, time display, and tag badges with responsive sizing (min 280px, 16:9 image).

tasks.title: Build RecipeHeader component
tasks.description: Create RecipeHeader.svelte with recipe title, source attribution, difficulty badge, time breakdown, servings with scaling, full tag list, and owner action buttons (edit/delete).

tasks.title: Build IngredientList and InstructionSteps components
tasks.description: Create IngredientList.svelte with checkbox items and scaling support, and InstructionSteps.svelte with numbered step rendering.

tasks.title: Build ScalingControl component
tasks.description: Create ScalingControl.svelte with increment/decrement buttons, current serving display, and reset button. Enforce min 1, max 100 constraints.

tasks.title: Build TagBadgeList component with group color mapping
tasks.description: Create TagBadgeList.svelte rendering color-coded tag badges by group (cuisine=blue, meal=green, diet=purple, technique=orange, custom=secondary) with optional truncation and click handler.

tasks.title: Build SearchBar component
tasks.description: Create SearchBar.svelte with debounced input (300ms), search icon, clear button, and Enter-to-submit behavior.

tasks.title: Build TagFilter component
tasks.description: Create TagFilter.svelte with collapsible tag group sections, three-state toggle (include/exclude/clear) per tag, usage counts, and a clear-all button.

tasks.title: Build SearchResults component
tasks.description: Create SearchResults.svelte with responsive RecipeCard grid (1/2/3/4 columns), results count header, empty state, and skeleton loading state.

tasks.title: Build ConfirmDialog component
tasks.description: Create ConfirmDialog.svelte wrapping shadcn Dialog with configurable title, description, confirm/cancel labels, and destructive variant support.

tasks.title: Implement mobile-responsive Navbar with hamburger menu
tasks.description: Extend Navbar.svelte with a mobile hamburger menu that collapses nav links into a slide-out drawer on small screens.

tasks.title: Write tests for custom UI components
tasks.description: Test RecipeCard rendering, ScalingControl constraints, TagBadgeList truncation, SearchBar debounce, TagFilter state toggling, Pagination bounds, and ConfirmDialog interactions.

tasks.title: Build RecipeEditor orchestrator component
tasks.description: Create RecipeEditor.svelte that composes the full editor form: title, author, difficulty, time fields, servings, tags, and Markdown body. Handle both create and edit modes with prop-driven initial state.

tasks.title: Build DurationInput component
tasks.description: Create DurationInput.svelte with hours (0–99) and minutes (0–59) numeric inputs that store/parse ISO 8601 durations (e.g., PT30M). Show auto-calculated totalTime as read-only when both prep and cook are filled.

tasks.title: Build TagInput component with autocomplete
tasks.description: Create TagInput.svelte with per-group tag entry, chip display with removal, autocomplete from GET /api/v1/tags/:group, input validation (lowercase, hyphenated, max 50 chars), and 20-tag-per-group limit.

tasks.title: Build MarkdownEditor component with toolbar
tasks.description: Create MarkdownEditor.svelte with monospace textarea (min 400px height, resizable), line numbers gutter, and MarkdownToolbar.svelte with formatting shortcuts (bold, italic, heading, lists, link).

tasks.title: Implement Markdown body template for new recipes
tasks.description: Pre-populate the Markdown editor with the starter template (## Ingredients, ## Instructions, ## Notes sections) when creating a new recipe.

tasks.title: Build RecipePreview live preview panel
tasks.description: Create RecipePreview.svelte that renders the current form state using RecipeHeader, IngredientList, and InstructionSteps components. Debounce Markdown rendering by 300ms. Make the panel collapsible on desktop and tab-based on mobile.

tasks.title: Implement client-side form validation
tasks.description: Add validation on blur and on save: title required (1–200 chars), servings positive integer, valid tag format, body must contain ## Ingredients and ## Instructions with at least one list item each, body max 50,000 chars. Display inline errors with scroll-to-first-error on save.

tasks.title: Implement create recipe save flow
tasks.description: Wire the Save button to POST /api/v1/recipes with assembled form data and source.type='manual'. Handle success (toast + redirect to /recipes/[slug]), validation errors (inline display), and network errors (error toast).

tasks.title: Implement edit recipe load and save flow
tasks.description: Load existing recipe data into the form on /recipes/[slug]/edit. Wire Save to PUT /api/v1/recipes/:slug. Handle 404, auth errors, and validation errors. Pre-fill all fields from the existing recipe.

tasks.title: Implement unsaved changes guard
tasks.description: Track dirty state across all form fields. Use SvelteKit's beforeNavigate to show a ConfirmDialog ('Unsaved changes — Leave or Stay?') when navigating away with unsaved changes.

tasks.title: Implement keyboard shortcuts for editor
tasks.description: Register Ctrl/Cmd+S (save), Ctrl/Cmd+P (toggle preview), and Escape (close preview) shortcuts. Prevent browser defaults for these key combos.

tasks.title: Implement responsive editor layout
tasks.description: Build the two-column layout (60/40 editor/preview) for desktop, single-column with tab toggle for tablet, and edit-only with preview tab for mobile. Handle preview panel collapse/expand.

tasks.title: Write tests for recipe editor components
tasks.description: Test DurationInput ISO 8601 parsing, TagInput validation and autocomplete, MarkdownEditor toolbar actions, form validation (valid and invalid cases), unsaved changes guard, save flow (create and edit), and server error mapping.

tasks.title: Build recipe viewer page with data loading
tasks.description: Create +page.server.ts that fetches the recipe by slug via GET /api/v1/recipes/:slug and passes the full recipe object plus isOwner flag. Create +page.svelte composing RecipeHeader, IngredientList, InstructionSteps, and Notes sections.

tasks.title: Implement ingredient scaling state and URL persistence
tasks.description: Add currentServings rune initialized from recipe.servings.default, synced to ?servings=N query parameter via replaceState. Wire ScalingControl to update currentServings and re-scale ingredient quantities.

tasks.title: Implement ingredient checkbox interaction
tasks.description: Add local-only checkbox state to each ingredient item. Checked items get strikethrough styling (line-through opacity-50). State is not persisted across page loads.

tasks.title: Render Notes section from Markdown body
tasks.description: Parse and render the ## Notes section from the recipe Markdown body. Show with a divider and heading if present, collapse by default on mobile.

tasks.title: Build RecipeActionBar component
tasks.description: Create RecipeActionBar.svelte with Print, Share, Add to Shopping List buttons for all users, plus Edit and Delete buttons for owners. Wire navigation and API calls.

tasks.title: Implement delete flow with confirmation dialog
tasks.description: Wire the Delete button to open a ConfirmDialog, then call DELETE /api/v1/recipes/:slug on confirm. Show success toast and redirect to /recipes, or error toast on failure.

tasks.title: Implement print view styles
tasks.description: Add @media print CSS rules: hide Navbar, Footer, ActionBar, ScalingControl, checkboxes, tags. Use serif font, 12pt, single column. Avoid page breaks inside instruction steps.

tasks.title: Implement share functionality
tasks.description: Add clipboard copy via navigator.clipboard.writeText() with toast confirmation. On mobile devices supporting navigator.share(), use native share sheet instead.

tasks.title: Implement responsive layout for recipe viewer
tasks.description: Build the two-column layout (35% ingredients, 65% instructions) for desktop with sticky ingredients sidebar. Stack vertically on tablet/mobile with collapsible ingredients section.

tasks.title: Write tests for recipe viewer
tasks.description: Test recipe data loading, ingredient scaling math and display, checkbox toggling, print style visibility, share/clipboard behavior, delete flow, responsive layout breakpoints, and accessibility (labels, skip links).

tasks.title: Build search page with data loading
tasks.description: Create +page.server.ts that reads query params (q, include, exclude, sort, page, pageSize) and fetches results from the appropriate API endpoint. Create +page.svelte composing SearchBar, TagFilter, SearchResults, and Pagination.

tasks.title: Implement URL-driven search state management
tasks.description: Persist all search/filter state in URL query parameters. Initialize UI controls from URL params on load. Use replaceState for filter/sort changes, pushState for pagination. Ensure browser back/forward works correctly.

tasks.title: Build SortSelect component
tasks.description: Create SortSelect.svelte using shadcn-svelte Select with options: Newest, Oldest, Title A–Z, Title Z–A, Recently Updated. Default to Newest (-createdAt). Update ?sort= query param on change.

tasks.title: Integrate TagFilter with API and URL state
tasks.description: Fetch available tags from GET /api/v1/tags on mount. Wire three-state tag toggles (default/include/exclude) to update ?include= and ?exclude= query params. Show usage counts per tag. Reset to page 1 on filter change.

tasks.title: Build ActiveFilters chip bar
tasks.description: Create ActiveFilters.svelte showing removable chips for each active include/exclude filter. Include filters use default badge styling, exclude filters use destructive/red styling. Add a Clear All button.

tasks.title: Build FilterDrawer for mobile
tasks.description: Create FilterDrawer.svelte as a slide-out panel containing TagFilter and SortSelect for tablet/mobile. Toggle via a Filters button with active filter count badge. Close with Escape key or overlay click.

tasks.title: Implement query composition logic
tasks.description: Compose the correct API request from combined search text, tag filters, sort, and pagination params. When both q and tag filters are present, send a combined request to /api/v1/recipes/query with the q parameter.

tasks.title: Implement loading, empty, and error states
tasks.description: Show skeleton card grids during loading, EmptyState components for no-results scenarios (no recipes, no matches, filters too restrictive), and ErrorBanner for API/network failures with retry.

tasks.title: Implement responsive search layout
tasks.description: Build the desktop sidebar layout (260px fixed + fluid grid), tablet drawer layout (2-column grid), and mobile layout (1-column grid with simplified pagination). Handle grid column breakpoints at 768px, 1024px, and 1440px.

tasks.title: Write tests for search UI
tasks.description: Test URL state round-tripping, query composition from combined inputs, tag filter toggle states, debounced search, pagination controls, empty/error state rendering, active filter chip removal, and accessibility (aria-live, keyboard nav).

tasks.title: Build UrlInput component with client-side validation
tasks.description: Create UrlInput.svelte with a full-width text input, submit button, auto-focus, and client-side validation (non-empty, starts with http(s)://, max 2048 chars). Display inline validation errors.

tasks.title: Build ImportProgress loading state component
tasks.description: Create ImportProgress.svelte with spinner, status message, domain display extracted from URL, indeterminate progress bar, Cancel button wired to AbortController, and reassurance message after 5 seconds.

tasks.title: Build ImportError component with error message mapping
tasks.description: Create ImportError.svelte that maps API error codes (INVALID_IMPORT_URL, IMPORT_FETCH_FAILED, IMPORT_NO_RECIPE_FOUND, etc.) to user-friendly messages. Include 'Try Another URL' and 'Create Manually' action buttons.

tasks.title: Build ConfidenceIndicator component
tasks.description: Create ConfidenceIndicator.svelte that wraps form fields with an amber warning border and tooltip for fields extracted with low confidence. Use aria-describedby for accessibility.

tasks.title: Build ImportWarnings collapsible alert section
tasks.description: Create ImportWarnings.svelte that renders import draft warnings (MISSING_TITLE, LOW_CONFIDENCE_FIELD, DUPLICATE_URL, etc.) as a collapsible alert list above the review form.

tasks.title: Build ImportReview component wrapping RecipeEditor
tasks.description: Create ImportReview.svelte that wraps RecipeEditor with import-specific additions: source banner showing origin URL and extraction method, confidence indicators on low-confidence fields, and read-only source.type/source.url fields.

tasks.title: Implement import flow page with step state machine
tasks.description: Create +page.svelte for /recipes/import with runes-based step state (input → loading → review/error). Wire UrlInput submission to POST /api/v1/recipes/import, handle success (show ImportReview) and failure (show ImportError). Implement AbortController for cancellation.

tasks.title: Implement import save and discard flows
tasks.description: Wire Save button in ImportReview to POST /api/v1/recipes with source.type='import'. On success, show toast and redirect to /recipes/[slug]. Implement Discard button with ConfirmDialog if edits were made, returning to URL input step.

tasks.title: Add auth guard to import route
tasks.description: Create +page.server.ts for /recipes/import that redirects unauthenticated users to /auth/login.

tasks.title: Write tests for import flow
tasks.description: Test URL validation (empty, invalid scheme, too long), loading state (cancel button, timeout message), error display for each error code, confidence indicator rendering, warning list display, save flow (success + error), discard flow with dirty check, and accessibility (aria-live, role=alert).

tasks.title: Build ImageUpload component with drag-and-drop and camera capture
tasks.description: Create ImageUpload.svelte with file picker (JPEG/PNG/WebP/HEIC), drag-and-drop zone with visual feedback, and camera capture button using <input capture="environment">. Client-side validation for file type and 10 MB size limit.

tasks.title: Build ImagePreview component
tasks.description: Create ImagePreview.svelte showing a thumbnail of the selected image (max 300px wide), file name/size display, and a Remove button. Use URL.createObjectURL() with proper cleanup on unmount.

tasks.title: Build LanguageSelect component
tasks.description: Create LanguageSelect.svelte dropdown for OCR language selection. Default to English (eng), support French, German, Spanish, Italian, Japanese, and bilingual combinations.

tasks.title: Build OcrProgress loading state component
tasks.description: Create OcrProgress.svelte with spinner, status message, indeterminate progress bar, selected image thumbnail, Cancel button wired to AbortController, and reassurance message after 10 seconds.

tasks.title: Build OcrError component with error message mapping
tasks.description: Create OcrError.svelte that maps OCR API error codes (OCR_NO_IMAGE, OCR_NO_TEXT, OCR_LOW_CONFIDENCE, etc.) to user-friendly messages. Include 'Try Another Image' and 'Create Manually' action buttons.

tasks.title: Build OcrConfidenceBanner component
tasks.description: Create OcrConfidenceBanner.svelte displaying overall OCR confidence as a color-coded banner: green (high, >=70), amber (medium, 50-69), red (low, <50) with guidance text.

tasks.title: Build RawTextPanel collapsible component
tasks.description: Create RawTextPanel.svelte as a collapsible section showing the full raw OCR text output for user reference. Labeled 'View raw OCR text', collapsed by default.

tasks.title: Build OcrWarnings and ConfidenceIndicator components
tasks.description: Create OcrWarnings.svelte rendering OCR draft warnings as a collapsible alert list. Create ConfidenceIndicator.svelte wrapping fields with amber warning border and tooltip for low-confidence sections.

tasks.title: Build AttestationModal component
tasks.description: Create AttestationModal.svelte with rights attestation dialog: radio buttons for attestation type (personal_use, public_domain, own_recipe, permission_granted), Save Recipe button disabled until selection, focus trap, and Escape to dismiss.

tasks.title: Build OcrReview component wrapping RecipeEditor
tasks.description: Create OcrReview.svelte that wraps RecipeEditor with OCR-specific additions: OcrConfidenceBanner, RawTextPanel, ConfidenceIndicators on low-confidence fields, OcrWarnings, and read-only source.type field.

tasks.title: Implement OCR flow page with step state machine
tasks.description: Create +page.svelte for /recipes/ocr with runes-based step state (upload -> processing -> review/error). Wire image upload to POST /api/v1/recipes/ocr via multipart/form-data, handle success (show OcrReview) and failure (show OcrError). Implement AbortController for cancellation.

tasks.title: Implement save flow with attestation and discard flow
tasks.description: Wire Save button to open AttestationModal, then POST /api/v1/recipes with source.type='ocr' and attestation data. On success, toast and redirect to /recipes/[slug]. Implement Discard button with ConfirmDialog if edits were made.

tasks.title: Add auth guard to OCR route
tasks.description: Create +page.server.ts for /recipes/ocr that redirects unauthenticated users to /auth/login.

tasks.title: Write tests for OCR flow
tasks.description: Test image upload validation (type, size, empty), drag-and-drop interaction, camera capture button visibility, processing state (cancel button, timeout message), error display for each error code, confidence banner levels, raw text panel toggle, attestation modal (radio selection, disabled save), save flow with attestation, discard flow with dirty check, and accessibility (aria-live, focus trap, role=alert).

tasks.title: Build RecipePicker component with search autocomplete
tasks.description: Create RecipePicker.svelte with debounced search input (300ms) querying GET /api/v1/recipes, dropdown results with title/difficulty/servings, click-to-add, duplicate prevention, and 20-recipe limit enforcement.

tasks.title: Build SelectedRecipeCard component
tasks.description: Create SelectedRecipeCard.svelte displaying recipe title, remove button, ScalingControl for servings adjustment, default servings label, and disabled increment/decrement at 0.25x-10x scaling limits.

tasks.title: Build ShoppingListView component
tasks.description: Create ShoppingListView.svelte rendering the combined shopping list with header (recipe count, item count), checkable items, checked count display, Uncheck All button, and source recipes reference section.

tasks.title: Build ShoppingListItem component with check-off interaction
tasks.description: Create ShoppingListItem.svelte with native checkbox, formatted quantity/unit, ingredient name, source recipe list, line-through/opacity styling when checked, and move-to-bottom behavior for checked items.

tasks.title: Build RecipeSummaryBar collapsed view
tasks.description: Create RecipeSummaryBar.svelte showing collapsed recipe selection summary after list generation with recipe count, Edit Recipes toggle to expand selection panel.

tasks.title: Implement shopping list page with step state machine
tasks.description: Create +page.svelte for /shopping-list with runes-based step state (select -> loading -> list). Wire Generate button to POST /api/v1/shopping-list, handle success (show ShoppingListView) and errors (toast messages).

tasks.title: Implement print view for shopping list
tasks.description: Add @media print CSS rules to ShoppingListView: hide Navbar, Footer, action buttons, checked items. Include list title with date and source recipes section. Trigger via window.print().

tasks.title: Implement clear and edit-recipes flows
tasks.description: Wire Clear button with ConfirmDialog when items are checked. Implement Edit Recipes toggle that re-expands recipe selection panel and triggers list regeneration on changes, resetting check state.

tasks.title: Implement responsive layout for shopping list page
tasks.description: Build desktop two-column layout (320px sidebar + fluid list), tablet stacked layout with collapsible selection, and mobile single-column layout with larger touch targets and tap-to-show sources.

tasks.title: Add auth guard to shopping list route
tasks.description: Create +page.server.ts for /shopping-list that redirects unauthenticated users to /auth/login.

tasks.title: Write tests for shopping list UI
tasks.description: Test recipe search debounce and autocomplete, duplicate recipe prevention, scaling control limits, Generate button disabled state, shopping list item check-off and sorting, Uncheck All, clear flow with confirm dialog, edit-recipes regeneration, print view visibility, error handling (toast messages), and accessibility (aria-live, role=listbox, keyboard nav).

tasks.title: Build recommendations page with initial data loading
tasks.description: Create +page.server.ts with auth guard and initial recommendation fetch via GET /api/v1/recommendations. Create +page.svelte composing MoodInput, RecommendationFilters, RecommendationCard grid, and Load More button.

tasks.title: Build MoodInput component
tasks.description: Create MoodInput.svelte with text input (placeholder: 'What are you looking for?'), 200-char max with character counter, Go submit button, Enter-to-submit, and clear (×) button. Submitting re-fetches recommendations with mood parameter.

tasks.title: Build RecommendationFilters component
tasks.description: Create RecommendationFilters.svelte with Difficulty select (Any/Easy/Medium/Hard), Max Time select (Any/15m/30m/1h/2h mapped to ISO 8601), and Exclude Owned checkbox. Filter changes trigger re-fetch.

tasks.title: Build RecommendationCard component
tasks.description: Create RecommendationCard.svelte extending RecipeCard with reason text displayed in muted style below tags and a score tooltip on hover. Card links to /recipes/{slug}.

tasks.title: Implement Load More pagination
tasks.description: Add Load More button that fetches the next page of recommendations and appends to the existing list. Track hasMore state to hide button when no more results. Announce new result count via aria-live.

tasks.title: Build PreferencesPanel component
tasks.description: Create PreferencesPanel.svelte as a slide-out panel (desktop) or full-screen modal (mobile) with TagProfileSummary, boost/suppression tag lists with add/remove, 20-preference limit enforcement, and Save button wired to PUT /api/v1/recommendations/preferences.

tasks.title: Build TagProfileSummary component
tasks.description: Create TagProfileSummary.svelte that fetches GET /api/v1/recommendations/profile and displays the user's top 5 tag frequencies with percentages as a summary line.

tasks.title: Build PreferenceTagInput component
tasks.description: Create PreferenceTagInput.svelte with autocomplete querying GET /api/v1/tags, group:value selection, duplicate and contradiction prevention (toast if tag already in opposite list), and disabled state at 20 total preferences.

tasks.title: Build ColdStartBanner component
tasks.description: Create ColdStartBanner.svelte displaying a prompt for new users: 'Save a few recipes or set preferences to get personalized recommendations.' Show suggested boost tags from popular tag groups. Uses role=status for screen readers.

tasks.title: Implement empty, loading, and error states
tasks.description: Show skeleton card grids during loading, EmptyState for no-recipes/no-matches/filter-too-restrictive scenarios, cold start banner for new users, and ErrorBanner with Retry for API failures.

tasks.title: Implement responsive layout for recommendations page
tasks.description: Build desktop 4-column card grid with 400px side preferences panel, tablet 2-column grid with modal preferences, and mobile 1-column grid with full-screen preferences and stacked filters.

tasks.title: Write tests for recommendations UI
tasks.description: Test initial feed loading, mood input submission and clear, filter changes triggering re-fetch, Load More appending results, preferences panel open/close, boost/suppression add/remove/save, contradiction prevention, cold start banner display, empty/error states, and accessibility (aria-live, focus trap, keyboard nav).
